title: New York’s Governor’s Race Is Suddenly Too Close for Democrats’ Comfort
description: Tightening polls, fears about crime and apathy in their base are driving a wave of Democratic hand-wringing and a pivot by Gov. Kathy Hochul.
dc:creator: Nicholas Fandos
media:credit: Thalia Juarez for The New York Times
media:description: Gov. Kathy Hochul has shifted her campaign message to focus more on concerns over crime.
